member.name: M:BeyondThemes.Bootstrap.TypeExtensions.TypeExtensions.AddOrMergeCssClass(System.Web.Mvc.TagBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new attribute. In case such attribute exists, it will merge them.

member.name: M:BeyondThemes.Bootstrap.TypeExtensions.TypeExtensions.AddOrMergeAttribute(System.Web.Mvc.TagBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new attribute. In case such attribute exists, it will merge them.

member.name: M:BeyondThemes.Bootstrap.TypeExtensions.TypeExtensions.MergeHtmlAttributes(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Merges two dictionaries. If key exists, it overrides it with new value. In case it's a class, it will add new values to existing.

member.name: M:BeyondThemes.Bootstrap.TypeExtensions.TypeExtensions.AddCssStyle(System.Web.Mvc.TagBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds Css style to a TagBuilder element
